Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • data.Timer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Timer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Created by loic on 21/01/17. this class is a timer, used to synchronize all the different threads
